Name: Buried Chambers
About the game: Buried Chambers is an incredibly addictive and action packed physics platformer. Visually Inspired by the Madness Combat series the game is hand drawn with a black, white and red color scheme with the red being for the blood and guts! - ofcourse. The game mechanics is a physics based platformer where you will sling shot your player around ''Death chambers'' all while shooting your way through enemies and figuring out puzzles, avoiding deadly traps, spikes, bombs, fire, you name it!. The game will feature 20 insanely hard levels so be warned, this may not be so casual! Nice range of weapons to splatter your enemies!. Bury your enemies or be buried.
